attributes.action: Say no to 9 hour days for primary school children
attributes.additional_details:
The government is trying to make children from 5 years old stay in school for 9 hours a day, when do these babies get to rest? They r children not work drones! Secondary school maybe primary school no!!!
They say it's good for mothers that work full time but what about the mothers that enjoy being with their children! Finishing at 6 pm is to late for primary children then bed at 7.30-8 when do the children get to see their parents?
